title: Project-Based Learning (PBL) Course for Designing Simulation-Based Science Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of fundamental science concepts and proficiency in digital tool utilization
context.additional_context: Scientific Problem-Solving Competency Strengthening Program for Office/Administrative Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can observe scientific phenomena in VR environments and build data-driven explanatory models
